<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs=""
>
[Yellow Musk Vial](/Equipment.aspx?ID=652)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Inhaled" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=96" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 301 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The powdered pollen from a yellow musk creeper addles the mind.

 **Saving Throw** DC 16 Will; **Maximum Duration** 2 rounds; **Stage 1** [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=14) by the poison cloud (1 round); **Stage 2** fascinated by the poison cloud, and can use no actions but to move closer to the cloud’s point of origin (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Yellow Musk Vial
